response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for both of us. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending this exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to purchase this exceptional item at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects my commitment to finding the right buyer who appreciates the true worth of the product. I believe it is a fair and advantageous proposition for both parties involved. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of completing this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Warm regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
